title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: Bangalore

Experience Level: 5+ years

Employment Type: Full-time




Job Summary




We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will have over 4 years of experience in analyzing business needs, gathering requirements, and collaborating with stakeholders to deliver innovative solutions. You will play a critical role in bridging the gap between business and technology, ensuring project success and value delivery.




Key Responsibilities




Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and document business requirements and objectives.
Analyze existing business processes, identify areas for improvement, and recommend solutions.
Create detailed functional specifications, use cases, and process flow diagrams.
Facilitate workshops, meetings, and presentations with stakeholders to gather insights and refine requirements.
Work closely with development teams to ensure technical solutions align with business needs.
Conduct gap analysis, feasibility studies, and cost-benefit analyses for proposed solutions.
Assist in the design, testing, and deployment of new systems and enhancements.
Manage and prioritize requirements using tools such as JIRA, Confluence, or Trello.
Provide support during user acceptance testing (UAT) and post-implementation review.
Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and company policies.




Qualifications and Skills




Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in Banking and Finance domain.
Strong knowledge of business process modeling and analysis tools.
Proficiency in requirements management tools (e.g., JIRA, Confluence).
Familiarity with Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall methodologies.
Exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact effectively with stakeholders at all levels.
Experience with data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
